jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
At Gojek, we want people applying to us to have a great experience throughout the process. We also want to quickly and effectively identify the best among them so we can hire them, while ensuring that our interview panelists are able to utilize their valuable time well.
Given our extremely exacting standards of hiring, achieving this requires strong communication skills and deep commitment. Outside-the-box problem-solving skills are essential.

We are looking for someone who can effectively shorten the time between touch points with candidates. We expect you to shorten the overall time from the first conversation to offer/rejection and use the interview panelists time and effort effectively with better scheduling and better communication of candidate's interview history with the panellists. You should be able to analyze data and identify what’s working and what isn’t, and feed that into the improvement process.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work closely with business leaders and recruiters to understand the staffing requirements and specific job objectives
  • Communicate with relevant candidates about the company and the job
  • Manage the ATS and keep it up to date
  • Coordinate and maintain calendar invites for Skype, T-con and, on-site interviews
  • Follow up with the candidates for assignment submissions and set up calls with panels whenever necessary
  • Maintain a complete record of interviews and sourcing trends
  • Stay up-to-date with current recruiting methods

• 1+ years work experience as a recruitment coordinator or equivalent
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Ability to prioritize and complete projects within deadline
  • Good understanding about various tech stacks
  • Familiarity with an applicant tracking systems / candidate management systems will be ideal
  • Familiarity with social media hiring
  • Good sourcing knowledge through various job portals
